name: Wahyu Untoro
bio: Experienced Mobile & Game Developer specializing in Flutter, SwiftUI, and React Native. I bridge the gap between complex logic and engaging user experiences, from AR/IoT integrations to seamless e-commerce apps.

description: Engineered and deployed an internal admin app for ticket validation, reducing manual errors and processing 394 guests in September using Flutter.
Automated daily OTA data reporting, successfully extracting and processing 70+ online orders per day.
Expanded product reach by publishing Hikaria to 20+ online travel platforms (OTAs), increasing visibility and contributing to sales growth.
Supervised R&D experiments and supported four developers in evaluating new frameworks for faster and more stable project workflows.
Created internal tools and private Flutter packages to simplify repetitive tasks, helping developers speed up delivery timelines by 30%.

Planned, developed, and maintained multiple mobile applications for clients in Japan and Indonesia using Flutter, Kotlin, React Native, and Swift, resulting in an average of 30% reduction in development time for cross-platform projects.
